session_summary: At 1:10 pm on 27 March 2023, Audrey and Andrew caught up. Andrew shared about his new job as a Financial Analyst, whereas Audrey talked about getting new collars for her dogs named Pepper, Precious, and Panda that she has had for 3 years. The dogs, city dwellers, go on adventures exploring parks and trails together. Andrew loves animals, particularly birds, with a fascination for eagles. He recommended the Fox Hollow trail for hiking to Audrey, who planned to give it a try. They bid goodbye, wishing each other well.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Hey Andrew! Good to see ya! What's been up since we last talked?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Hey Audrey! So, I started a new job as a Financial Analyst last week - it's been quite a change from my previous job. How about you? Anything interesting happening?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Congrats on the new job! So I got these new collars and tags for my dogs - so cute!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! That sounds cute. Can I see a picture?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of two dogs are standing in the grass with their mouths open
conversation_turns.text: Sure! See them with their new collars, cute right?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Cute little guys! What are their names and how long have you had them?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: I've had them for 3 years! Their names are Pepper, Precious and Panda. I can't live without my little ones!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: That's awesome! Have you always wanted a dog, even with living in the city? Can they still go on adventures?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Absolutely! They're city dogs and we explore all the time. They love trying out new parks and trails. We go on adventures together very often.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Wow, sounds like they make life so awesome! Kinda jealous of all those fun outings with them.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: They really do! It's great how much happiness they bring. Do you have any pets?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: No, no pets right now. But I do love animals.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: That's great to hear! Animals are truly amazing. Do you have a favorite animal?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: I've always been awed by birds. Their power to soar and explore new spots is amazing.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, birds are amazing! I can imagine it feels incredible to soar and see the world from up high. Do you have a favorite type of bird?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two birds flying in the sky with a sun shining behind them
conversation_turns.text: Eagles have always mesmerized me; they're so strong and graceful!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Yeah they're beautiful. Do you go bird-watching? It must be awesome to see them up close.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Haven't specifically gone out for bird-watching, but I do spot them when I hike.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Nice, spotting pretty birds while hiking must be great. Do you have any favorite hiking spots?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Fox Hollow is a great trail to hike on weekends; the views are awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Cool, gonna give it a try. Thanks for the suggestion!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: No problem! Let me know how you like it. Have fun hiking!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! I'll let you know. Have a good one!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Take care and have a good one! See ya!

Audrey: Audrey purchases three collars and tags for her dogs Pepper, Precious and Panda.
Andrew: Andrew starts a new job as a financial analyst.

Audrey: Audrey got new collars and tags for her dogs.
Audrey has had her dogs named Pepper, Precious, and Panda for 3 years.
Audrey's dogs are city dogs and they love exploring new parks and trails.
Andrew: Andrew started a new job as a Financial Analyst last week.
Andrew does not currently have any pets.
Andrew loves animals and is awed by birds, especially eagles.
Andrew enjoys spotting pretty birds while hiking in places like Fox Hollow.
